attributes.action: dissolve Parliament in the light of the recent revelations over MP's expenses and the way that several Mp's have abused them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Confidence in our MP's and in our Parliamentary system has arrived at an all time low. The latest revelations about MP's expenses and the way that they have been abused by some MP's, coming on the back of the present financial crisis, means that many will possibly not bother to vote in any  forth coming elections - this is a crisis for our Democracy and can only be resolved by a clean sweep and the disolving of this present Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
